```{r}
library(dplyr)

# 12anos 0050083
# Philomena 2431286
# her 1798709
# gravity 1454468

newmovies <- read.delim("~/Projetos/MovieTweetings/latest/newmovies.dat", header=FALSE)
colnames(newmovies) <- c("movie_id", "movie_title", "genre")

filter(newmovies, movie_id == 1454468)

newratings <- read.delim("~/Projetos/MovieTweetings/latest/newratings.dat", header=FALSE)
colnames(newratings) <-  c("user_id", "movie_id", "rating", "rating_timestamp")

nebraska <- filter(newratings, movie_id == 1454468 & rating_timestamp > 1389830400)
nebraska2 <- filter(newratings, movie_id == 1454468 & rating_timestamp < 1389830400)

mean(nebraska$rating)
mean(nebraska2$rating)

# Jan - 16 - 2014 =  1389830400


```
